Package org.apache.avalon.meta.info.builder.tags

Utility classes supporting encapsulation of the representation of a the different tags supported in the merlin meta info model.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Tags Interface holding static tag constants.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTag A doclet tag representing the name of the Type.
AttributeTag A doclet tag representing the set of attributes associated with the class.
ContextTag A doclet tag handler for the 'extension' tag.
DependencyTag A doclet tag representing the lifestyle assigned to the Type.
ExtensionTag A doclet tag handler for the 'extension' tag.
LoggerTag A doclet tag handler supporting 'logger' tags.
SchemaTag A doclet tag handler supporting 'logger' tags.
ServicesTag A doclet tag representing services exported by a type.
ServiceTag A doclet tag the declares a service definition.
StageTag A doclet tag handler for the 'stage' tag.
TypeTag A doclet tag the declares a a Type descriptor using the &avalon.type or &avalon.component javadoc tag.
 

Package org.apache.avalon.meta.info.builder.tags Description

Utility classes supporting encapsulation of the representation of a the different tags supported in the merlin meta info model.
